alert.note: Alert for Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 2:19PM MST until March 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From 2 AM Friday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
